description: GearHead BT9500BLK Wireless Optical Mouse Scroll through your work documents faster with the GearHead BT9500BLK Wireless Optical Mouse. With its optical sensing technology, the GearHead BT9500BLK Wireless Optical Mouse virtually works on any surface, even on glass. Plus with the Bluetooth 3.0 Wireless Connectivity, it allows you to navigate your computer with a breeze and it eliminates cable clutter. Get accurate, precise cursor control and enjoy wireless freedom with the GearHead BT9500BLK Wireless Optical Mouse today. What It Is and Why You Need It: Features optical sensing technology Lets you enjoy bluetooth 3.0 wireless connectivity Has a built-in scroll wheel Energy saving design 2 AAA Batteries Specifications GearHead BT9500BLK Wireless Optical Mouse Device Type: Mouse Connection Type: Wireless Bluetooth Tracking Method: Optical Resolution: 1600 DPI Colors: Black/Silver Scrolling Capability: Yes Operating Systems Supported: Mac Windows 2000 PC XP Windows 7 Vista Mac OS 10.3 and above
title: Gear Head Blue Tooth Laser Mouse for Mac Book Pro, Silver with Black Accents (BT9500BLK)
